participant_1.background:
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
i have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
i cannot get enough ginger snaps.
i have been bankrupt and back.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the sensation of my back being scratched, but not saliva.
i am a huge buffalo bills fan , and our family has season tickets.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
i am a hopeless romantic.
I remember playing with my pet fox in the backyard when I was a child.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Not bad. I'm at the farm working on some chores.
Oh nice, what kind of farm do you have?
I have a small farm where I herd cattle.
That's cool. I've never been to a farm before.
You should come visit sometime. I'd love to show you around.
That would be great. Thanks for the invite.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with friends and family. I also enjoy playing video games and reading.
I'm a huge gamer too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but my favorite are RPGs.
I love RPGs too. I'm currently playing Final Fantasy XIV.
That's a great game. I've been playing it for a few years now.
What's your favorite class?
I main a white mage.
Nice. I main a dragoon.
I love playing healers. They're so much fun.
Yeah, they're really important to a party.
So, what's your favorite thing to do on the farm?
I love working with the animals. They're so cute and cuddly.
I bet they are. I've always wanted to pet a cow.
You're welcome to come pet any of our cows.
Thanks for the offer. I might just take you up on that
